saveHighScore() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.highscores.HighScoreManager
Saves the serializable list to the pacman_high_score file inside the high_scores folder.
SceneIDs - Class in org.fridlund.pacman.scenes
Class containing static fields, for easy Scene management

setAllGhostsInvincible() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.managers.GhostManager
Makes all ghosts invincible again, should be called a desired amount of time after activating the warning on the ghosts.
setAllGhostsKillable() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.managers.GhostManager
Makes all ghosts that are loose in the labyrinth killable by Pacman.

Selects both body and eye animation at the same time.
setColor(Vector4f) - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.entities.GhostGraphics
 
setGameOver() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.scenes.GameplayScene
Shows the game over menu, and your points won't get stored in the high scores file.
setGameWon() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.scenes.GameplayScene
Basically the same menu as the game over, but now your points will get stored in the high scores file.
setGhostReleaseable(boolean) - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.managers.GhostManager
Makes the ghosts able to get out from the nest.
setGhostsInvincible() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.scenes.GameplayScene
Makes all ghosts in GhostManager invincible again.
setGhostsReleaseable(boolean) - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.scenes.GameplayScene
Makes the GhostManager aware that the ghosts are allowed to leave the nest (for instance, when the super snack effect is over, all killed ghosts are allowed to return to the maze).

setWarningOfSuperSnackEffectSoonGone() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.scenes.GameplayScene
Used from the SnackManager to inform the GhostManager to make the ghosts blink, because of super snack effect is soon over.
setWarningOnGhosts() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.managers.GhostManager
Activates the blinking effect on the ghosts, short before they get invincible again.

superSnackEaten() - Method in class org.fridlund.pacman.scenes.GameplayScene
Makes all ghosts killable in the GhostManager for a certain amount of time (specified in the GhostManager) and also sets Pacman angry, to change his animation.
